static int [] edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.CityGdiModels.applyDecisionTree ( double  pattern[][]  )  [static] 

00050                                                              {
00051         int[] result = new int[ pattern.length ];
00052         for (int i=0; i < pattern.length; ++i){
00053             double pop = pattern[i][0];
00054             double light = pattern[i][1];
00055             if (light < 48.91){
00056                 if (light < 17.61){
00057                     result[i] = 0;
00058                 } else {
00059                     result[i] = 1;
00060                 }
00061             } else {
00062                 if ( light < 81.25 ){
00063                     if ( pop >= 31.77 ){
00064                         result[i] = 1;
00065                     } else {
00066                         result[i] = 2;
00067                     }
00068                 } else {
00069                     if ( pop >= 105.7 ){
00070                         result[i] = 2;
00071                     } else {
00072                         result[i] = 4;
00073                     }
00074                 }
00075             }
00076         }
00077         return result;
00078     }

static int [] edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.CityGdiModels.applyLinearModel ( double  pattern[][]  )  [static] 

00042                                                             {
00043         int[] result = new int[ pattern.length ];
00044         for (int i=0; i < pattern.length; ++i){
00045             result[i] = (int) Math.round(0.003494 + 0.034444 * pattern[i][1] - 0.005992 * pattern[i][0]);
00046         }
00047         return result;
00048     }

00094                                                               {
00095         int[] result = new int[ pattern.length ];
00096         for (int i=0; i < pattern.length; ++i){
00097             result[i] = (int) Math.round(100 * probOfRichNN(pattern[i][0], pattern[i][1]));
00098         }

static double [][] edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.CityGdiModels.findPatterns ( LabelResult  cities,
LatLonGrid  population,
LatLonGrid  nightTimeLights 
) [static] 

00029                                                                                                                  {
00030         // make sure that this is identical to GdiPattern.java
00031         RegionProperty[] pop = RegionProperty.compute(cities, population);
00032         RegionProperty[] lights = RegionProperty.compute(cities, nightTimeLights);
00033 
00034         double[][] patterns = new double[pop.length][2];
00035         for (int i=1; i < patterns.length; ++i){
00036             patterns[i][0] = pop[i].getCval();
00037             patterns[i][1] = lights[i].getCval();
00038         }
00039         return patterns;
00040     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.CityGdiModels.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00102                                                             {
00103         // create output directory
00104         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("gdimodels");
00105         final boolean SMALL = true;
00106         
00107         // read input (crop to cover China)
00108         LatLonGrid pop    = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.WORLD);
00109         if (SMALL){
00110             pop = pop.crop(900, 6000, 800, 1600); // China mainly
00111         }
00112         KmlWriter.write(pop, out, "modelpop", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00113         
00114         LatLonGrid nightTimeLights = NightimeLights.read(NightimeLights.WORLD).remapTo(pop);
00115         KmlWriter.write(nightTimeLights, out, "modellights", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00116         
00117         EnhancedWatershedSegmenter seg = new EnhancedWatershedSegmenter(10, 1, 600, 10, 5);
00118         LabelResult allcities = seg.label(pop);     
00119         KmlWriter.write(allcities.label, out, "modelcities", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00120 
00121         // compute gdi for each city
00122         double[][] patterns = findPatterns(allcities, pop, nightTimeLights);        
00123         String[] models = {"linear", "tree", "nn" };                
00124         for (String model : models){
00125             int[] modelresult = null;
00126             if (model.equals("linear")){
00127                 modelresult = applyLinearModel(patterns);
00128             } else if (model.equals("tree")){
00129                 modelresult = applyDecisionTree(patterns);
00130             } else if (model.equals("nn")){
00131                 modelresult = applyNeuralNetwork(patterns);
00132             }
00133             LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(allcities.label);
00134             result.setMissing(WorldBankGDI.DevelopmentCategory.Unknown.ordinal());
00135             result.fill( result.getMissing() );
00136             for (int i=0; i < result.getNumLat(); ++i){
00137                 for (int j=0; j < result.getNumLon(); ++j){
00138                     int cityno = allcities.label.getValue(i,j);
00139                     if (cityno > 0 ){
00140                         result.setValue(i, j, modelresult[cityno]);
00141                     }
00142                 }
00143             }
00144             KmlWriter.write(result, out, model+"gdi", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00145         }
00146     }
